game

Class Farmer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.Human
          • game.Farmer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface

    public class Farmer
extends Human
    Class representing a Farmer as a type of Human. It allows the farmer to perform a lists of actions with the behaviours it has.
    Author:
    weijianlai

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        Returns an Action to be performed during its turn. It will be able to harvest the crop if it is standing on a ripe crop. Else, it will call farming behaviour to sow or fertilise the crop. If the farmer could not do any of it above, it will wander around.
        Overrides:
        playTurn in class Human
        Parameters:
        actions - collection of possible actions for farmer in the turn
        map - the map containing the Actor
        display - the object that performs the console I/O
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed, e.g. sowing, fertilising or harvesting a crop

      • isFarmer

        public boolean isFarmer()
        return the instance of farmer. It will return true if its a farmer. This is to allow to check from other classes to see if the actor is a farmer

      • isHuman

        Description copied from class: Human
